name: Christmas Santa Wood Cutter
description:
Christmas Santa Wood Cutter is a recreation of the famous Timberman but with a Christmas setting. 

Help Santa collect wood and avoid wood sticks! Beat your highscore!

  • This was a project I've made to build my game portfolio
  • The game was made more or less in 5 hours
  • Hardest Challenge in the development: 
    • Physics: at first I thought I would use Unity's Physics to handle tree chops. I discovered that Physics in this engine can be very hard to manage. In the end I took another way and implemented the game without Physics lol.
